title: Maharani Kempu Haar: Diamond & Coral Grand Necklace
materials: Ruby and Emerald accents. Crafted with Hyderabadi Kundan setting techniques.
features: This magnificent Haaram showcases a fusion of traditional and contemporary design. The striking semi-circular diamond pave pattern is accented with vibrant coral beads, creating a regal statement. A stunning floral motif at the center, set with rubies, acts as a focal point. The elaborate paisley-shaped pendant below boasts an intricate diamond-studded floral pattern, complemented by delicate gold ball drops (gundla dandalu). The Kundan setting allows each diamond's brilliance to truly shine.
colors: and Dazzling White (Diamonds). The contrast creates a rich and opulent color palette
characteristic of South Indian Bridal Jewelry.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations like weddings (Vivahaalu)
or any special occasion where you want to make a lasting impression. An excellent choice for Bharatanatyam performances or cultural events.
description: This Haaram is a unique blend of tradition and modern elegance. The impeccable craftsmanship, combined with the high-quality diamonds and genuine coral, makes it a valuable heirloom piece. The Panchaloha finish gives it a rich, antique look, while the contemporary design ensures it remains a timeless classic. Its durability and enduring design will last for generations.
